info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 31 at 6:32PM EDT until July 31 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
info.description:
* WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...Portions of DC, including the following , District of Columbia and central Maryland, including the following county, Montgomery.
* WHEN...Until 900 PM EDT.
* IMPACTS...Streams continue to rise due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. It will take several hours for all the water from these storms to work through local drainage systems in urban areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 631 PM EDT, emergency management reported heavy rain in the warned area due to thunderstorms. Flooding is already occurring. Beach Drive at East Stanhope Road is closed due to flooding from Rock Creek. - Flooding impacts will continue, but no additional rainfall is expected. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bethesda... North Bethesda... Chevy Chase... South Kensington... Forest Glen... Martin's Additions... North Chevy Chase... Silver Spring... Kensington... Chevy Chase Village... Chevy Chase View... Chevy Chase Section Five... National Zoo... - This includes the following Flood Prone Roads... Beach Dr from Broad Branch Rd to Piney Branch Pkwy, Connecticut Avenue just north of the Beltway and Beach Drive along Rock Creek. - Please visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for flood safety and preparedness information
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM EDT THIS EVENING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING

area.areaDesc: District of Columbia, DC; Montgomery, MD
